entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
